member.name: P:BookClassLibrary.Book.Title
member.summary: Book Titles property that allows titles only over 2 chars. in length

member.name: P:BookClassLibrary.Book.PageNumber
member.summary: Books PageNumber property which will throw an error if the int value is below 10 or over 1000

member.name: P:BookClassLibrary.Book.Isbn13
member.summary: Books Isbn13 property which only allows strings that are 13 chars in length
